ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 2*Effio CCD Camera, 700 TV Lines, 3.6mm lens, 26pcs IR LED.  4*Effio CCD Waterproof Outdoor or Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 26pcs IR LEDs, 66 ft IR Distance. All Metal Vandal Proof.
8 Channel DVR H.264 960H & D1 Resolution, 2TB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS, D1 Real-Time Recording+Playback, 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & Realtime D1 Recording+Playback,6 Effio CCD Camera 700 TV Lines, iPhone Android Viewable
